credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
style: Early 17th c needle lace and style
title: Border
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace (punto in aria)
description: Border of serpentine bands of floral and foliated forms irregularly placed. Pattern outlined by cordonnet and interspersed by portes, enchainettes. Both pieces edged by small-scale pendants.
name: Border
